data.name: Error_NullEntity
data.value: The entity cannot be null.

data.name: Error_InvalidId
data.value: The ID must be greater than zero.

data.name: Error_InvalidCalorieLogId
data.value: The CalorieLog ID must be greater than zero.

data.name: Error_InvalidFoodId
data.value: The Food ID must be greater than zero.

data.name: Error_EntityNotFound
data.value: The requested entity was not found.

data.name: Error_DatabaseOperationFailed
data.value: The database operation failed.

data.name: Error_ValidationFailed
data.value: Validation failed for the entity.

data.name: Error_InvalidDate
data.value: The date cannot be default or invalid.

data.name: Error_InvalidDateRange
data.value: The start date must be before the end date.

data.name: Error_DuplicateDate
data.value: A calorie log already exists for this date.

data.name: Error_DuplicateFoodLog
data.value: This food is already logged for this calorie log.

data.name: Error_EmptyName
data.value: The name cannot be empty or whitespace.

data.name: Error_DuplicateFood
data.value: A food with this name already exists.

data.name: Error_FoodInUse
data.value: Cannot delete food that is being used in food logs.

data.name: Error_DuplicateIngredient
data.value: An ingredient with this name already exists.

data.name: Error_DuplicateBarcode
data.value: A product with this barcode already exists.

data.name: Error_DuplicateGoal
data.value: A goal of this type already exists for the user.

data.name: Error_DuplicateRecipe
data.value: A recipe with this name already exists.

data.name: Error_DuplicateWorkout
data.value: A workout with this name already exists.

data.name: Error_DuplicateEmail
data.value: A user with this email already exists.

data.name: Success_EntityAdded
data.value: The entity was successfully added.

data.name: Success_EntityUpdated
data.value: The entity was successfully updated.

data.name: Success_EntityDeleted
data.value: The entity was successfully deleted.

data.name: Success_OperationCompleted
data.value: The operation was completed successfully.
